2072.subject: HPWE
2072.descrlong: Demonstrate depth of knowledge, integration and synthesis of your learning across disciplines (with your Subject Matter Conentration as one discipline area) through a well-defined research project and/ or paper.  Under the guidance of the Capstone professor, you formulate a research proposal of your interest and complete a literature review.
